snippet: The current system creates incentives for doctors to choose the medication or treatment with a higher price. Medicare is going to try a new approach.
abstract: The Upshot; Medicare announces it will test new payment method in some parts of country in order to see if changing financial incentives for doctors who prescribe drugs can influence which drugs they prescribe; agency has authority to do so under Affordable Care Act, and test is meant to address concerns that doctors prescribe more expensive drugs when cheaper alternatives will do.
lead_paragraph: The current system creates incentives for doctors to choose the medication or treatment with a higher price. Medicare is going to try a new approach.

headline.print_headline: Medicare Tries Experiment to Fight Perverse Incentives
headline.main: Medicare Tries an Experiment to Fight Perverse Incentives
